identity.mission: Create a high-density, trust-inducing financial admin panel that breaks the 'boring admin' stereotype while maintaining extreme functional clarity.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss precision with Cyberpunk data density.
Emotion First: Every pixel must convey 'Control' and 'Accuracy'.
Content is King: Data is the hero. Charts and numbers take precedence over decoration.
Zoom In: Focus on the micro-details of financial metrics.
Negative Space: Use it to separate dense data clusters.

headings.usage: Use for all page titles, card headers, and metric values. Tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for tables, labels, inputs, and general text. Excellent legibility for numbers.

mono.usage: Use strictly for Transaction IDs, API keys, and raw data logs.

typography.installation: Import from Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=IBM+Plex+Sans:wght@400;500;600&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500&family=Manrope:wght@400;600;700;800&display=swap');

primary.description: Electric Blue for primary actions and active states. Represents technology and speed.

layout_strategy.spacing: Compact but breathable. Use p-6 for cards, gap-4 for grids.
rules: Full Height: Children must use h-full to stretch.
No Jagged Bottoms: Align grid items to form a solid block.

cards.style: Flat, 1px border (border-white/10), no shadow in dark mode.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white rounded-md font-medium hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(59,130,246,0.4)]

inputs.style: bg-input_bg border-white/10 focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-md h-10

tables.style: Compact density. Header text-xs uppercase tracking-wider text-gray-500. Row hover: bg-white/5.

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on the sidebar to reduce digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.micro_interactions: Buttons scale down (0.98) on click. Links have a sliding underline.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use only for sticky headers/overlays: bg-black/60 backdrop-blur-xl border-b border-white/5.

setup: Install dependencies: yarn add lucide-react recharts framer-motion clsx tailwind-merge
Configure Tailwind colors in tailwind.config.js to match the 'Obsidian Ledger' palette.
Add the Google Fonts import to index.css.
implementation_order: 1. Setup Layout (Sidebar + Header + Main Content Area).
3. Build MFO Management (Data Table with Actions).
critical_rules: DO NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid dark colors.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (WCAG AA).
Use 'recharts' for all charts. Style them to match the dark theme (no white backgrounds).

general: Avoid 'AI slop' aesthetic (generic centered layouts, uniform styling).
Create depth through z-index hierarchy and subtle borders.
NO universal transitions (transition: all). Animate specific properties.
NO text-align: center on the main app container.
Use pill-shaped or sharp buttons, never default browser styles.
NEVER use emojis for icons. Use Lucide React.
components: Customize Shadcn components to remove the 'Vercel default' look.
Use named exports for components, default exports for pages.
